statements.name: PROC GROOVY
statements.description: Enables SAS code to run Groovy code on the JVM.

statements.name: ADD
statements.description: Appends the given classpath to the current CLASSPATH environment variable.

statements.name: EVALUATE
statements.description: Parses the Groovy statement that is provided in the quoted string into a groovy.lang.Script object and calls the Run method on the Script.

statements.name: EXECUTE
statements.description: Reads the contents of the file that is specified as either a quoted string path or as a fileref.

statements.name: SUBMIT
statements.description: Parses the Groovy statements that are between the SUBMIT and ENDSUBMIT commands into a groovy.lang.Script object and calls the Run method on the Script.

statements.name: ENDSUBMIT
statements.description: Ends the Groovy statements that begin with the SUBMIT command.

statements.name: CLEAR
statements.description: Empties the binding and unloads the Groovy classloader.
